00001 /***************************************************************************

00007 Description          : Test the export of QPainter grafics to
00008                                            Windows Enhanced Metafiles (.emf) by using GDI+ calls
00009 ****************************************************************************/
00010 /***************************************************************************
00011  *
00012  *  Commercial Usage

00020 #include "renderarea.h"
00021 #include <EmfEngine.h>
00022 #include <QApplication>
00023 #include <QFile>
00024 
00025 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00026 {
00027         QApplication app(argc, argv);
00028         RenderArea area;
00029 
00030         area.setGeometry(100, 100, 600, 500);
00031         area.show();
00032 
00033         //store emf image to clipboard
00034         EmfPaintDevice emf0(QSize(600, 500));
00035         QPainter paint;
00036         paint.begin(&emf0);
00037         area.draw(&paint);
00038         paint.end();
00039 
00040         //save graphics to WMF format
00041         EmfPaintDevice emf1(QSize(600, 500), "example.wmf");
00042         paint.begin(&emf1);
00043         area.draw(&paint);
00044         paint.end();
00045 
00046         EmfPaintDevice emf2(QSize(600, 500), 1024 * 256);//allocates a memory buffer (256 kilobytes)
00047         paint.begin(&emf2);
00048         area.draw(&paint);
00049         paint.end();
00050 
00051         QByteArray ba = emf2.data();
00052 
00053         //create an EMF file from the byte array in memory
00054         QFile file("example.emf");
00055         file.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly);
00056         file.write(ba);
00057         file.close();
00058 
00059         printf("Metafile size is: %d bytes\n", (int)emf2.metafileSize());
00060         printf("QByteArray size is: %d bytes\n", (int)ba.size());
00061 
00062         return app.exec();
00063 }
